title: Advanced Topics in Machine Learning
description:
The module introduces advanced topics in machine learning and their applications to real-world problems. Sample topics include: data driven modelling, data
assimilation, convex learning problems, regularization and stability, multiclass predictors, dimension reduction, feature selection and generation, graphical models, hidden Markov models, Gaussian random field, reinforcement learning,
deep learning.
prerequisite: DSA5102 Foundations of Machine Learning, or departmental approval.
